name: Easy Vegan Pasta with Kale and Chickpeas
author: Rita
summary: These is one of my go-to recipes for a quick, healthy midweek meal though it is good enough for guests, too. We eat a lot of garlic in our family, but you can of course reduce the amount.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Drain, reserving about 1 cup of cooking water
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat and cook garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add kale and cook, stirring constantly, until wilted, about 3 minutes
Stir cooked spaghetti into the skillet
Add enough of the reserved cooking water to create a thick sauce
Add chickpeas and heat until warmed, 2 to 4 minutes
